TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DropDownList extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler
Public Class DropDownList Inherits ListControl Implements IPostBackDataHandler
type DropDownList = class inherit ListControl interface IPostBackDataHandler

summary.span: 表示允许用户从下拉列表中选择单个项的控件。

span.span: Represents a control that allows the user to select a single item from a drop-down list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#Introduction) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#Accessibility) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 介绍Introduction 使用控件创建单项选择下拉列表控件。Use the control to create a single-selection drop-down list control. 你可以控制的外观通过设置， ，和属性。You can control the appearance of the control by setting the , , and properties. 指定你想要显示在项控制，请将放每个条目开始和结束标记之间的对象控件。To specify the items that you want to appear in the control, place a object for each entry between the opening and closing tags of the control. 控件还支持数据绑定。The control also supports data binding. 若要将控件绑定到数据源，创建数据源，如对象，包含要在控件中显示的项。To bind the control to a data source, create a data source, such as a object, that contains the items to display in the control. 然后，使用方法来绑定到数据源控件。Then, use the method to bind the data source to the control. 使用属性以编程方式确定用户从选定的项的索引控件。Use the property to programmatically determine the index of the item selected by the user from the control. 然后可以使用索引检索的选定的项`Items`在控件集合。The index can then be used to retrieve the selected item from the `Items` collection of the control. ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件，以使其生成符合辅助功能标准的标记的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples Visual Studio Web 站点项目与源代码是可用本主题可以附带：[下载](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=191893)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=191893). 下面的代码示例演示如何创建包含四个项的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control that contains four items. [!code-aspx-csharp[DropDownListDeclarative#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DropDownListDeclarative/CS/dropdownlistdeclarativecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DropDownListDeclarative#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DropDownListDeclarative/VB/dropdownlistdeclarativevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何创建控制通过数据绑定。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control though data binding. [!code-aspx-csharp[DropDownListDataBinding#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DropDownListDataBinding/CS/dropdownlistdatabindingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DropDownListDataBinding#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DropDownListDataBinding/VB/dropdownlistdatabindingvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 属性继承自类并不是适用于控件。The property is inherited from the class and is not applicable to the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取或设置中自定义属性控件。The following code example demonstrates how to get or set the property in a custom control. 有关使用自定义服务器控件的信息，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义的 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For information about using custom server controls, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). summary.span: 处理 控件的回发数据。

span.span: Processes postback data for the control.

returns.span: 如果回发事件导致 控件的状态发生更改，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control's state changes as a result of the postback event; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 页框架跟踪返回的所有服务器控件`true`从此方法调用，并调用方法控件。The ASP.NET page framework tracks all the server controls that return `true` from this method call, and then invokes the method on the control.

summary.span: 回发发生时引发 控件的事件。

span.span: Raises events for the control when postback occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 页面框架调用方法控制方法指示列表项的状态已更改在控件。The ASP.NET page framework calls the method on a control when the method indicates that the state of the list items has changed in the control. 方法调用方法来引发事件。The method calls the method to raise the event. 控件开发人员可以重写方法以执行自定义处理，当用户选择控件中的项。Control developers can override the method to perform custom processing when the user selects items in the control.

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件中的选定项的索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the index of the selected item in the control.

value.span: 控件中的选定项的索引。

span.span: The index of the selected item in the control.

value.span: 默认值为 0，该值选择列表中的第一项。

span.span: The default value is 0, which selects the first item in the list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以编程方式指定或确定的选定项的索引控件。Use the property to programmatically specify or determine the index of the selected item from the control. 始终中选择一项控件。An item is always selected in the control. 无法清除在同一时间从列表中每个项选择。You cannot clear the selection from every item in the list at the same time. > [!NOTE] > 中的项的索引控件是从零开始。The indexes for the items in the control are zero-based. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来确定中的选定的项控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the selected item in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[DropDownListSelectedIndex#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DropDownListSelectedIndex/CS/dropdownlistselectedindexcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DropDownListSelectedIndex#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DropDownListSelectedIndex/VB/dropdownlistselectedindexvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示在控件的 属性为 时，控件是否应将呈现的 HTML 元素的 特性设置为 "disabled"。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's property is .

value.span: 如果属性指示 ASP.NET 版本低于4.0; 否则为。

span.span: if the property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than 4.0; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示 ASP.NET 应的呈现方式 HTML 控件时控件被禁用。This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled. 如果此属性为`true`，ASP.NET 呈现`disabled`属性时控件被禁用。If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled. 如果此属性为`false`，ASP.NET 呈现`class`属性时控件被禁用。If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

summary.span: 始终引发 异常，因为对于 控件不支持多选。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件不支持多个选择，则将引发异常。The control does not support multiple selections and throws an exception.

span.span: In all cases.
